item.title: YouTube Video Editor - Upwork
item.description:
Hello!

Our team is looking for a video editor who is skilled in storytelling! I will be creating almost vlog style videos and dont need fancy edits or animations, looking for someone who is a master at storytelling through footage. A comparison account would be Casey Neistat.

If you feel that you could support our team please apply and reach out!



Posted On: June 21, 2024 11:49 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro
Skills: Video Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro
Location Requirement: Only freelancers located in the United States may apply.
Country: United States
click to apply
